rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A spacious entryway with Art Deco-inspired motifs, featuring geometric patterns and a prominent archway that welcomes guests. The entrance is oriented to the North as per Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: A large living room with modern Art Deco design elements, including streamlined furniture and decorative accents. It provides ample natural light from the south-facing window.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: A dedicated dining area that flows seamlessly into the living room, adorned with elegant Art Deco detailing and comfortable seating.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: An open plan kitchen incorporating modern appliances and cabinetry, designed for efficient workflow while featuring Art Deco accents.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: A private master bedroom with en-suite bathroom. The design incorporates calming colors and subtle Art Deco detailing to enhance relaxation.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: En-suite bathroom attached to the master bedroom featuring modern fixtures with Art Deco style.

rooms.name: Servant's Quarters
rooms.description: A dedicated living space for domestic help, ensuring privacy and comfort. It includes basic amenities and adheres to functional design principles.

openings.name: Main Entrance Door
openings.description: A grand entrance door designed in an Art Deco style with geometric patterns, providing a welcoming approach.

openings.name: Window Opening
openings.description: Large window for ample natural light and scenic garden views.

openings.name: Balcony Access
openings.description: A balcony that overlooks the garden, offering additional outdoor space and a view of nature.
